相干态路径积分及其应用

谐振子相干态

一维谐振子的哈密顿量可以写为如下形式:

这里 、 分别是产生、消灭算符, 满足如下玻色子对易关系:
$$
\left[\hat{a},\hat{a}^{\dagger}\right]-=1,\quad\left[\hat{a},\hat{a}\right]-=\left[\hat{a}^{\dagger},\hat{a}^{\dagger}\right]-=0.

\hat{N}=\hat{a}^{\dagger} \hat{a},



\begin{aligned} \sum{n}|n\rangle\langle n| &=\mathbb 1 &\text {(完备性), }\ \left.\left\langle n’\right| n\right\rangle &=\delta_{n n’} & \text{(正交性). } \end{aligned}

\hat{a}|0\rangle=0,



\hat{a}|\alpha\rangle=\alpha|\alpha\rangle,

\langle\alpha| \hat{a}^{\dagger}=\alpha^*\langle\alpha| .

|\alpha\rangle=\mathrm{e}^{-\frac{|\alpha|^{2}}{2}} \mathrm{e}^{\alpha \hat{a}^{\dagger}}|0\rangle,
$$
前面的常数因子是归一化常数.

但其一般不正交，有如下关系:
$$
\left.\left\langle\alpha’ \right| \alpha\right\rangle=\exp \left[-\frac{|\alpha|^2}{2}-\frac{\left|\alpha’\right|^{2}}{2}+\alpha \alpha^{\prime }\right],

\left.\left|\left\langle\alpha’ \right| \alpha\right\rangle\right|^{2}=\mathrm{e}^{-\left|\alpha-\alpha’\right|^{2}},
$$

多体理论中的玻色子系统相干态

前面已经介绍了一维谐振子相干态, 而对于全同粒子体系, 每一个单粒子态都对应着不同的相干态. 下面介绍凝聚态场论中全同玻色子系统的相干态. 为简单起见, 先从单分量的情况考虑, 这实际上就是一维谐振子相干态.

单分量玻色子相干态

场论中我们用 代替 表示相干态, 这里 仍然是消灭算符的本征态. 为方便起见, 凝聚态场论中考虑如下没有归一化的相干态:

这里 仍是复数, 是粒子真空态. 有如下本征方程:

上式的厄米共轭为:
$$
\langle\phi| \hat{a}^{\dagger}=\phi^\langle\phi|,

\left{\begin{aligned} \hat{a}^{\dagger}|\phi\rangle &=\frac{\partial}{\partial \phi}|\phi\rangle, \ \langle\phi| \hat{a} &=\frac{\partial}{\partial \phi^}\langle\phi| . \end{aligned}\right.
$$
下面讨论单分量情况玻色子系统相干态的性质:

  • 内积(非正交归一)

    凝聚态场论中用到的相干态是非归一化的, 而且相干态本身不同的态之间不正交，一般有如下关系:


Proof.
$$
\begin{aligned} \langle\phi | \phi\rangle &=\left\langle 0\left|\mathrm{e}^{\hat{a} \phi^*} \mathrm{e}^{\phi \hat{a}^{\dagger}}\right| 0\right\rangle\ &=\left\langle 0\left|\sum_{m} \frac{\left(\hat{a} \phi^\right)}{m !} \sum_{n} \frac{\phi \hat{a}^{\dagger}}{n !}\right| 0\right\rangle \ &=\sum_{m} \sum_{n} \frac{\left(\phi^\right)^{m}}{m !} \frac{\phi^{n}}{n !}\left\langle 0\left|\hat{a}^{m}\left(\hat{a}^{\dagger}\right)^{n}\right| 0\right\rangle\ &=\sum_{m} \sum_{n} \frac{\left(\phi^\right)^{m}}{m !} \frac{\phi^{n}}{n !}\langle m|\sqrt{m !} \sqrt{n !}| n\rangle \ &=\sum_{m} \sum_{n} \frac{(\phi^)^{m}}{m !} \frac{\phi^{n}}{n !} \sqrt{m !} \sqrt{n !} \delta_{m n}\ &=\sum_{n} \frac{\left(\phi^* \phi\right)^{n}}{n !} \ &=\mathrm{e}^{\phi^* \phi}. \end{aligned}

\langle\phi’ | \phi\rangle=\mathrm{e}^{\phi^{\prime *} \phi}.
$$

  • 完备性

    相干态本身具有超完备性, 但是这里我们使用的是未归一化的相干态, 所以单位算符和前面的形式有所不同:


同样地, 可以在相干态表象下对算符求迹:

这是下面推导配分函数路径积分形式的基础.

考虑 写成了产生、消灭算符的函数形式 , 而且产生、消灭算符是按正规乘积的顺序排列的, 则单分量玻色子情况的配分函数函数可以写成如下求迹的形式:

按量子力学中路径积分的方法, 把 看成是时间(虚时), 分为 个等份, 每一份为 , 得到:

在任意两个相邻 之间插入单位算符 , 得到:
$$
\begin{aligned} \left\langle\phi\left|\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{H}}\right| \phi\right\rangle=& \int \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \phi_{1}}{\pi} \cdots \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \phi_{N-1}}{\pi} \mathrm{e}^{-\phi_{1}^* \phi^{}{1}} \cdots \mathrm{e}^{-\phi{j}^* \phi^{}{j}} \cdots \mathrm{e}^{\phi{N-1}^* \phi^{}{N-1}} \ &\times\left\langle\phi\left|\mathrm{e}^{-\Delta \tau \hat{H}}\right| \phi{N-1}\right\rangle \cdots\left\langle\phi_{j}\left|\mathrm{e}^{-\Delta \tau \hat{H}}\right| \phi_{j-1}\right\rangle \cdots\left\langle\phi_{1}\left|\mathrm{e}^{-\Delta \tau \hat{H}}\right| \phi\right\rangle, \end{aligned}

|\phi\rangle \equiv\left|\phi_{0}\right\rangle, \quad\langle\phi| \equiv\left\langle\phi_{N}\right|,

\begin{aligned} \left\langle\phi_{j}\left|\mathrm{e}^{-\Delta \tau \hat{H}}\right| \phi_{j-1}\right\rangle & \approx\left\langle\phi_{j}\left|(1-\Delta \tau \hat{H})\right| \phi_{j-1}\right\rangle \ &=\left.\left\langle\phi^{}{j} \right| \phi^{}{j-1}\right\rangle-\Delta \tau\left\langle\phi^{}{j}\left|\hat{H}\left(\hat{a}^{\dagger}, \hat{a}\right)\right| \phi^{}{j-1}\right\rangle \ &=\left.\left\langle\phi^{}{j} \right| \phi^{}{j-1}\right\rangle-\Delta \tau\left\langle\phi^{}{j}\left|H\left(\phi{j}^*, \phi^{}{j-1}\right)\right| \phi^{}{j-1}\right\rangle \ &=\left[1-\Delta \tau H\left(\phi_{j}^*, \phi^{}{j-1}\right)\right]\left.\left\langle\phi^{}{j} \right| \phi^{}{j-1}\right\rangle \ &=\mathrm{e}^{-\Delta \tau H\left(\phi{j}^*, \phi^{}{j-1}\right)} \mathrm{e}^{\phi{j}^* \phi^{}{j-1}}. \end{aligned}

\mathscr{D}{N}\left(\phi^*, \phi\right)=\prod_{j=1}^{N}\left(\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \phi_{j}}{\pi}\right),

\begin{aligned} \mathcal{Z} &=\lim {N \rightarrow \infty} \int \mathscr{D}{N}\left(\phi^*, \phi\right) \exp \left{-\sum_{j=1}^{N}\left[\phi_{j}^\left(\phi^{}{j}-\phi^{}{j-1}\right)+\Delta \tau H\left(\phi_{j}^, \phi^{}{j-1}\right)\right]\right} \ &=\lim {N \rightarrow \infty}\int \mathscr{D}{N}\left(\phi^*, \phi\right) \exp \left{-\Delta \tau \sum{j=1}^{N}\left[ \frac{\phi_{j}^\left(\phi^{}{j}-\phi^{}{j-1}\right)}{\Delta \tau}+H\left(\phi_{j}^, \phi^{}{j-1}\right)\right]\right} \ &\equiv\lim {N \rightarrow \infty} \int \mathscr{D}{N}\left(\phi^*, \phi\right) \mathrm{e}^{-S{N}}, \end{aligned}

S_{N}=\Delta \tau \sum_{j=1}^{N}\left[ \frac{\phi_{j}^\left(\phi^{}{j}-\phi^{}{j-1}\right)}{\Delta \tau}+H\left(\phi_{j}^, \phi^{}{j-1}\right)\right]

\begin{aligned} \phi{j} & \rightarrow \phi(\tau), \ \frac{\phi_{j}^\left(\phi^{}{j}-\phi^{}{j-1}\right)}{\Delta \tau}& \rightarrow \phi^(\tau) \frac{\partial}{\partial \tau} \phi(\tau), \ \sum_{j=1}^{N}\Delta \tau & \rightarrow \int_{0}^{\beta} \mathrm{d} \tau, \ \mathscr{D}{N}\left(\phi^*, \phi\right) & \rightarrow \mathscr{D}\left(\phi^*, \phi\right),\ S_N&\rightarrow S, \end{aligned}

\mathcal{Z}=\int \mathscr{D}\left(\phi^*, \phi\right) \mathrm{e}^{-S\left(\phi^*, \phi\right)},

S=\int{0}^{\beta} \mathrm{d} \tau\left[\phi^*(\tau) \frac{\partial}{\partial \tau} \phi(\tau)+H\left(\phi^*(\tau), {\phi}(\tau)\right)\right],

\phi(0)=\phi(\beta), \quad \phi^*(0)=\phi^*(\beta).

\hat{H}=(\varepsilon-\mu) \hat{a}^{\dagger} \hat{a},


$$

多分量玻色子相干态

多分量(多粒子)系统的相干态是单变量(单粒子)系统相干态的直积, 哈密顿量为
$$
\hat H=\sum_k(\varepsilon_k^0-\mu) \hat{a}k^{\dagger} \hat{a}^{}k + \frac{1}{2}\sum{kk’}\sum{q}V(\boldsymbol q)\hat{a}^{\dagger}{k+q}\hat{a}^{\dagger}{k’-q}\hat{a}^{}{k’}\hat{a}^{}k,

\left[\hat{a}^{}k, \hat{a}^{\dagger}{k’}\right]-=\delta{kk’},\quad\left[\hat{a}^{}k, \hat{a}^{}{k’}\right]-=\left[\hat{a}k^{\dagger}, \hat{a}{k’}^{\dagger}\right]-=0.

|\phi\rangle \equiv \prod_k \mathrm{e}^{\phi^{}_k \hat{a}_k^{\dagger}}|0\rangle,

\hat{a}_k|\phi\rangle=\phi_k|\phi\rangle,

\langle\phi| \hat{a}^{\dagger}=\phi_k^\langle\phi|.

\left{\begin{aligned} \hat{a}_k^{\dagger}|\phi\rangle=\frac{\partial}{\partial \phi_k}|\phi\rangle, \ \langle\phi| \hat{a}_k=\frac{\partial}{\partial \phi_k^}\langle\phi| . \end{aligned}\right.
$$
下面讨论多分量情况玻色子系统相干态的性质.

  • 内积(非正交归一)

$$
\left.\left\langle\phi \right|\phi\right\rangle=\exp \left(\sum_k \phi_k^* \phi^{}_k\right)=\prod_k \mathrm{e}^{\phi^*_k \phi^{}k},

\left.\left\langle\phi’ \right| \phi\right\rangle=\exp \left(\sum_k \phi{k’}^* \phi^{}k\right)=\prod_k \mathrm{e}^{\phi^*{k’} \phi^{}_k}.
$$

  • 完备性

    有如下恒等算符:


同样, 多分量情况下对玻色子系统本征态的求迹可以写为对相干态的积分形式:
$$
\operatorname{Tr} \hat{A}=\int\left(\prod_k \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2} \phi_k}{\pi}\right) \mathrm{e}^{-\sum\limits_k \phi^*_k \phi^{}k}\langle\phi|\hat{A}| \phi\rangle.

\mathcal{Z}=\int\mathscr{D}\left(\phi^*, \phi\right) \mathrm{e}^{-S\left(\phi^*, \phi\right)},

\mathscr{D}\left(\phi^*, \phi\right)=\prod_k\mathscr{D}\left(\phi_k^*, \phi^{}k\right),

S=\int{0}^{\beta} \mathrm{d} \tau\sum_k\left[\left(\phi_k^*(\tau) \frac{\partial}{\partial \tau} \phi^{}k(\tau)\right)+H\left(\phi_k^*, \phi^{}k\right)\right].

\begin{aligned} S=&\int{0}^{\beta} \mathrm{d} \tau\Bigg[\sum_k\left(\phi_k^*(\tau) \frac{\partial}{\partial \tau} \phi^{}k(\tau)\right)+\sum_k(\varepsilon_k^0-\mu) {\phi}k^*(\tau) {\phi}^{}k(\tau)\ &+ \frac{1}{2}\sum{kk’}\sum{q}V(\boldsymbol q){\phi}^*{k+q}(\tau){\phi}^*{k’-q}(\tau){\phi}^{}{k’}(\tau){\phi}^{}_k(\tau)\Bigg]. \end{aligned}
$$

多体理论中的费米子系统相干态

Grassmann 数

费米系统的产生、消灭算符可以记作、, 满足如下费米子对易关系:

且有

引入粒子数算符:

其满足本征方程:

对应本征态为

费米子体系中的消灭算符没有本征值为非零复数的本征态. 为方便研究, 我们直接假设 的本征态为 , 本征值为 , 即:

其复共轭为:
$$
\langle\zeta| \hat{C}^{\dagger}=\zeta^\langle\zeta|,
$$
此时的 和 $\zeta^$ 已经不再是普通的数(复数). 我们称这个”奇怪”的数为Grassmann 数.

Grassman 数 满足如下关系(Grassmann 代数):
$$
\left[\zeta, \zeta^\right]_{+}=0, \quad \zeta^{2}=\left(\zeta^\right)^{2}=0,

(\lambda \zeta)^*=\lambda^* \zeta^*.

\left[\hat{C}, \zeta\right]{+}=\left[\hat{C}, \zeta^*\right]{+}=\left[\hat{C}^{\dagger}, \zeta\right]{+}=\left[\hat{C}^{\dagger}, \zeta^*\right]{+}=0 .
$$
Grassmann 数的函数可以用其泰勒展开定义, 例如函数 $f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)$
f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)=f_{0}+f_{1} \zeta+\bar{f}{1} \zeta^*+f{12} \zeta^* \zeta,
$$
可以看出由于 Grassmann 数之间的反对易关系, Grassmann 数的函数的展开总是有限的, 这一点可以推广到多变量的情况.

下面讨论 Grassmann 数的微分和积分. 首先是微分运算, 这里以对 $f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)$
\frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta} f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)=f_{1}+f_{12} \frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta}\left(\zeta^\zeta\right),

\frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta} f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)=f_{1}-f_{12} \zeta^*,

\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta}, \zeta^\right]_{+}=0.

\frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta^} f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)=\bar{f}{1}+f{12} \zeta.

\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial \zeta^ \partial \zeta} f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)=\frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta^}\left(f_{1}-f_{12} \zeta^\right)=-f_{12},
$$
对 Grassmann 数的二阶微分不同于普通数的二阶微分, 而是有顺序的, 这里是先对 微分, 然后对 $\zeta^$
\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial \zeta \partial \zeta^*} f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)=f_{12},

\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta}, \frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta^}\right]_{+}=0,
$$
注意这里的 和 是两个独立的量.

下面考虑积分运算. 首先对 Grassmann 数的积分做如下定义:

即任意常数对 Grassmann 数的积分为零, 只有当被积函数是积分变量的一次项时积分才不为零. 根据定义, 可以得到 Grassmann 数的积分有如下推论:

下面计算 $f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)\zeta$
\begin{aligned} \int \mathrm{d} \zeta f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right) &=\int \mathrm{d} \zeta\left[f_{0}+f_{1} \zeta+\bar{f}{1} \zeta^*+f{12} \zeta^* \zeta\right] \ &=f_{1}-f_{12} \zeta^* \int \mathrm{d} \zeta \cdot \zeta \ &=f_{1}-f_{12} \zeta^*, \end{aligned}
$$
同样地, 可以计算 $f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right)\zeta ^$
\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^* f\left(\zeta, \zeta^\right) =\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^\left[f_{0}+f_{1} \zeta+\bar{f}{1} \zeta^*+f{12} \zeta^* \zeta\right] =\bar{f}{1}+f{12} \zeta.
$$
可以看到, Grassmann 数的积分运算结果与前述微分运算结果一致.

单分量费米子相干态

在 Grassmann 数的基础上可以定义单分量情况下费米子系统相干态 为：

这里 仍代表粒子真空态, 满足 . 这样定义的费米子相干态是费米子消灭算符的本征态, 满足如下本征方程:

Proof.

和玻色子情况类似, 可以得到如下关系:
$$
\left{\begin{aligned} \hat{C}|\zeta\rangle &=\zeta|\zeta\rangle, \langle\zeta| \hat{C}^{\dagger} &=\zeta^\langle\zeta|, \end{aligned}\right.\quad\left{\begin{aligned}\hat{C}|\zeta\rangle & =-\frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta}|\zeta\rangle, \ \langle\zeta| \hat{C}^{\dagger} & =\frac{\partial}{\partial \zeta^}\langle\zeta| .\end{aligned}\right.
$$
下面考虑单分量情况下费米子相干态的性质.

  • 内积(非正交归一)


Proof.

  • 完备性

费米子相干态也是超完备的, 有如下单位算符:


Proof.
$$
\begin{aligned} \int \mathrm{d} \zeta^* \mathrm{d} \zeta \mathrm{e}^{-\zeta^* \zeta}|\zeta\rangle\langle\zeta| &=\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^* \mathrm{d} \zeta\left(1-\zeta^* \zeta\right)\left(1-\zeta \hat{C}^{\dagger}\right)|0\rangle\langle 0|\left(1-\hat{C} \zeta^\right) \ &=\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^ \mathrm{d} \zeta\left(1-\zeta^* \zeta-\zeta \hat{C}^{\dagger}+ \zeta^* \zeta \zeta \hat{C}^{\dagger} \right)|0\rangle\langle 0|\left(1-\hat{C} \zeta^\right) \ &=\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^ \mathrm{d} \zeta\left(1-\zeta^* \zeta-\zeta \hat{C}^{\dagger}\right)|0\rangle\langle 0|-\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^* \mathrm{d} \zeta\left(1-\zeta^* \zeta-\zeta \hat{C}^{\dagger}\right)| 0\rangle\langle 0| \hat{C} \zeta^* \ &=|0\rangle\langle 0|+\hat{C}^{\dagger}|0\rangle\langle 0|\hat{C} \ &=|0\rangle\langle 0|+|1\rangle\langle 1|=\mathbb 1. \end{aligned}


$$
注意这里左矢中的负号. 下面证明上式最后一行就是求迹:

Proof.
$$
\begin{aligned} \int \mathrm{d} \zeta^* \mathrm{d} \zeta \mathrm{e}^{-\zeta^* \zeta}\langle-\zeta|\hat{A}| \zeta\rangle=& \int \mathrm{d} \zeta^* \mathrm{d} \zeta\left(1-\zeta^* \zeta\right)\left\langle 0\left|\left(1+\hat{C} \zeta^\right) \hat{A}\left(1-\zeta \hat{C}^{\dagger}\right)\right| 0\right\rangle \ =& \int \mathrm{d} \zeta^ \mathrm{d} \zeta\left\langle 0\left|\left(1+\hat{C} \zeta^\right) \hat{A}\left(1-\zeta \hat{C}^{\dagger}\right)\right| 0\right\rangle \ &-\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^ \mathrm{d} \zeta \zeta^* \zeta\left\langle 0\left|\left(1+\hat{C} \zeta^\right) \hat{A}\left(1-\zeta \hat{C}^{\dagger}\right)\right| 0\right\rangle \ =&-\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^ \mathrm{d} \zeta\left\langle 0\left|\hat{C} \zeta^* \hat{A} \zeta \hat{C}^{\dagger}\right| 0\right\rangle-\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^* \mathrm{d} \zeta \zeta^* \zeta\langle 0|\hat{A}| 0\rangle \ =&\langle 1|\hat{A}| 1\rangle+\langle 0|\hat{A}| 0\rangle \ =&\operatorname{Tr} \hat{A}. \end{aligned}

\hat{H}=(\varepsilon-\mu)\hat{C}^{\dagger}\hat{C},



\hat N\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta(\varepsilon-\mu)\hat{C}^{\dagger} \hat{C}} \right]=1+\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta(\varepsilon-\mu)} -1\right]\hat{C}^{\dagger} \hat{C},



\begin{aligned} \mathcal{Z}&=\operatorname{Tr}\left[\mathrm{e}^{-\beta \hat{H}}\right]=\int \mathrm{d} \zeta^* \mathrm{d} \zeta \mathrm{e}^{-\zeta^* \zeta}\left\langle-\zeta\left|\mathrm{e}^{-\beta\hat{H}}\right| \zeta\right\rangle\ &=\lim {N \rightarrow \infty} \int\left(\prod{j=1}^{N} \mathrm{d} \zeta_{j}^* \mathrm{d} \zeta^{}{j}\right) \exp \left[-\sum{j=1}^{N} \zeta_{j}^\left(\zeta^{}{j}-\zeta^{}{j-1}\right)+\Delta \tau(\varepsilon-\mu) \zeta_{j}^ \zeta^{}{j-1}\right]. \end{aligned}

\mathcal{Z}=\int \mathscr{D}\left(\zeta^*, \zeta\right) \mathrm{e}^{-S} ,

S=\int{0}^{\beta} \mathrm{d} \tau \zeta^*(\tau)\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}+(\varepsilon-\mu)\right) \zeta(\tau) ,

\zeta(0)=-\zeta(\beta), \quad \zeta^*(0)=-\zeta^*(\beta) .
$$

多分量费米子相干态

考虑多分量情况下哈密顿量为
$$
\hat{H}=\sum_{k \sigma}\left(\varepsilon_k^{0}-\mu\right) \hat{C}{k \sigma}^{\dagger} \hat{C}^{}{k \sigma}+\frac{1}{2} \sum_{k k’} \sum_{\sigma \sigma’} \sum_{q} V(\boldsymbol{q}) \hat{C}{k+q , \sigma}^{\dagger} \hat{C}{k’- q,\sigma’ }^{\dagger} \hat{C}^{}{k’ \sigma’} \hat{C}^{}{k \sigma}.

\hat{C}^{}k \rightarrow \zeta^{}k ,\quad \hat{C}k^{\dagger} \rightarrow \zeta_k^{\dagger},

\left{\begin{aligned} \hat{C}k |\zeta\rangle&=\zeta_k|\zeta\rangle,\ \langle\zeta| \hat{C}k^{\dagger}&=\langle\zeta|\zeta_k^*, \end{aligned}\right.

\left{\begin{aligned} &{\left[\zeta^{}k, \zeta{k’}^*\right]{+}=\left[\zeta^{}k, \zeta^{}{k’}\right]{+}=\left[\zeta_k^*, \zeta{k’}^*\right]{+}=0 .} \ &{\left[\hat{C}^{}k, \zeta^{}{k’}\right]{+}=\left[\hat{C}k^{\dagger}, \zeta^{}{k’}\right]{+}=\left[\hat{C}^{}k, \zeta{k’}^*\right]{+}=\left[\hat{C}k^{\dagger}, \zeta{k’}^\right]{+}=0 .}\end{aligned}\right.

\left(\hat{C}^{}k \zeta^{}{k’}\right)^{\dagger} \equiv \zeta{k’}^ \hat{C}_k^{\dagger}.

|\zeta\rangle\equiv\mathrm{e}^{-\sum\limits_k \zeta^{}_k \hat{C}_k^{\dagger}}|0\rangle=\prod_k \mathrm{e}^{-\zeta^{}_k C_k^{\dagger}}|0\rangle,
$$
这是任意单粒子消灭算符的本征态.

这样定义的费米子相干态有如下性质：

  • 内积(非正交归一)

  • 完备性


同样地, 求迹可以表示为:
$$
\operatorname{Tr} \hat{A}=\int\left(\prod_k \mathrm{d} \zeta_k^* \mathrm{d} \zeta^{}_k\right) \mathrm{e}^{-\sum\limits_k \zeta^*_k \zeta^{}k}\langle-\zeta|\hat{A}| \zeta\rangle .

\mathcal{Z}=\int \mathscr{D}\left(\zeta^*, \zeta\right) \mathrm{e}^{-S},

S=\int{0}^{\beta} \mathrm{d} \tau\left[\sum_k\zeta_k^*(\tau) \frac{\partial}{\partial \tau} \zeta_k(\tau)+H\left(\zeta_k^* , \zeta^{}_k\right)\right] ,

\zeta^{}_k(0) =-\zeta^{}_k ( \beta ),\quad \zeta_k^*(0)=-\zeta_k^*(\beta).
$$

路径积分方法在超导理论中的应用

超导体的哈密顿量具有以下形式:
$$
\hat{H}=\sum_\sigma \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}\hat{\psi}{\sigma}^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x})\left(-\frac{\nabla^{2}}{2 m}-\mu\right) \hat{\psi}^{}{\sigma}(\boldsymbol{x})-g \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x} \hat{\psi}{\uparrow}^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x}) \hat{\psi}{\downarrow}^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x}) \hat{\psi}^{ }{\downarrow}(\boldsymbol{x}) \hat{\psi}^{ }{\uparrow}(\boldsymbol{x}),

\hat{C}^{}k \rightarrow C^{}k, \hat{C}k^{\dagger} \rightarrow \bar{C}^{}k, \hat{\psi}^{}{\uparrow}(\boldsymbol{x}) \rightarrow \psi^{}{\uparrow}(\boldsymbol{x}), \hat{\psi}{\uparrow}^{\dagger}(\boldsymbol{x}) \rightarrow \bar{\psi}^{}{\uparrow}(\boldsymbol{x}) ,

\mathcal{Z}=\int \mathscr{D}\bar{\psi}\mathscr{D}\psi \mathrm{e}^{-S},

\begin{aligned} S=\int_{0}^{\beta} \mathrm{d} \tau \int \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}&\Bigg[\sum_{\sigma} \bar{\psi}{\sigma}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}-\frac{\nabla^{2}}{2 m}-\mu\right) \psi{\sigma}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\ &-g \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \psi_{\downarrow}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau) \psi_{\uparrow}(\boldsymbol{x}, \tau)\Bigg]. \end{aligned}



k \rightarrow\left{\boldsymbol k, \mathrm i \omega_{n}\right},\quad \sum_k \rightarrow \sum_{\boldsymbol k} \sum_{\omega_{n}},
$$

有

此时作用量可以写作
$$
\begin{aligned} S&=\int \mathrm{d} x\left[{\sum_{\sigma} \bar{\psi}{\sigma}(x)\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}-\frac{\nabla^{2}}{2 m}-\mu\right) \psi{\sigma}(x)}{-g \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)}\right]\ &\equiv S_0+S’. \end{aligned}

\mathrm{e}^{-S’}=\exp\left[g \int \mathrm{d} x\bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)\right],

A(x)=\psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)\equiv \Delta^*(x),\quad B(x)=\bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x)\equiv\Delta(x),

\begin{aligned} \mathrm{e}^{g \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)}&=\frac{\displaystyle\int \frac{\mathrm{d} \Delta^* \mathrm{d} \Delta}{2 \mathrm{i}} \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{|\Delta(x)|^{2}}{g}+\left[\Delta^*( x)\psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)+\Delta(x) \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x)\right]}} { \displaystyle\int \frac{\mathrm{d} \Delta^* \mathrm{d} \Delta}{2 \mathrm{i}} \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{|\Delta(x)|^{2}}{g}}}\ &\sim\int \mathrm{d} \Delta^* \mathrm{d} \Delta \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{|\Delta(x)|^{2}}{g}+\left[\Delta^*( x)\psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)+\Delta(x) \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x)\right]} , \end{aligned}

\mathrm{e}^{-S’}=\int \mathscr{D} \Delta^* \mathscr{D} \Delta \exp \left{-\int \mathrm{d} x\left[\frac{\left|\Delta(x)\right|^{2}}{g}-\left[\Delta^*( x)\psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)+\Delta(x) \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x)\right]\right]\right},

\begin{aligned} \mathcal{Z}=&\int \mathscr{D} \bar{\psi} \mathscr{D} \psi \mathrm{e}^{-S}\nonumber\ =&\int \mathscr{D} \bar{\psi} \mathscr{D} \psi \mathrm{e}^{-S_{0}} \mathrm{e}^{-S’}\nonumber\ =&\int \mathscr{D} \bar{\psi} \mathscr{D} \psi \mathrm{e}^{-\int \mathrm{d} x\left[\sum\limits_{\sigma} \bar{\psi}{\sigma}(x)\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}-\frac{\nabla^{2}}{2 m}-\mu\right) \psi{\sigma}(x)\right]}\nonumber\ &\times \int \mathscr{D} \Delta^* \mathscr{D} \Delta \mathrm{e}^{-\int \mathrm{d} x \left{\frac{|\Delta(x)|^2 }{g}-\left[\Delta^*( x)\psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)+\Delta(x) \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x)\right]\right}}\nonumber\ =&\int \mathscr{D} \Delta^* \mathscr{D} \Delta \mathrm{e}^{-\int \mathrm{d} x \frac{|\Delta(x)|^2 }{g}}\nonumber\ &\times \int \mathscr{D} \bar{\psi} \mathscr{D} \psi \mathrm{e}^{-\int \mathrm{d} x\left{\sum\limits_{\sigma} \bar{\psi}{\sigma}(x)\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}-\frac{\nabla^{2}}{2 m}-\mu\right) \psi{\sigma}(x)-\left[\Delta^*( x)\psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)+\Delta(x) \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x)\right]\right}}\nonumber\ \equiv&\int\mathscr{D} \Delta^\mathscr{D} \Delta \mathrm{e}^{-\int \mathrm{d} x \frac{|\Delta(x)|^{2}}{g}} F\left(\Delta^, \Delta\right),\end{aligned}

F\left(\Delta^*, \Delta\right)=\int\mathscr{D} \bar{\psi} \mathscr{D} \psi \mathrm{e}^{-\int \mathrm{d} x\left{\sum\limits_{\sigma} \bar{\psi}{\sigma}(x)\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}-\frac{\nabla^{2}}{2 m}-\mu\right) \psi{\sigma}(x)-\left[\Delta^*( x)\psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)+\Delta(x) \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x)\right]\right}}.

\Delta(x)=\Delta^{}0, \quad \Delta^*(x)=\Delta^*0,

\begin{aligned} F\left(\Delta^*, \Delta\right)&=F\left(\Delta_0^*, \Delta^{}0\right)\ &=\int \mathscr{D} \bar{\psi} \mathscr{D} \psi \mathrm{e}^{-\int \mathrm{d} x\left{\sum\limits{\sigma} \bar{\psi}^{}{\sigma}(x)\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}-\frac{\nabla^{2}}{2 m}-\mu\right) \psi^{}{\sigma}(x)-\left[\Delta_0^*( x)\psi_{\downarrow}(x) \psi_{\uparrow}(x)+\Delta^{}0(x) \bar{\psi}{\uparrow}(x) \bar{\psi}{\downarrow}(x)\right]\right}}. \end{aligned}

\left{\begin{aligned} \psi{\sigma}(x)&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V\beta}} \sum_k C_{\sigma}(k) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} k x} ,\ \bar{\psi}{\sigma}(x)&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{V\beta}} \sum_k \bar{C}{\sigma}(k) \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{i} k x}, \end{aligned}\right.

F\left(\Delta_{0}^*, \Delta^{}{0}\right)=\int \mathscr{D} \bar{C} \mathscr{D} C \mathrm{e}^{-\sum\limits{kk’} \bar{\phi}(k) M_{kk’} \phi({k’})},

\phi(k)\equiv\left(\begin{array}{c} C_{\uparrow}(k) \ \bar{C}{\downarrow}(-k) \end{array}\right), \bar{\phi}{(k)}=\left(\bar{C}{\uparrow}(k), {C}{\downarrow}(-k)\right) ,M{k k’}=\delta_{k k’} M_{k k},

M_{k k} \equiv\left[\right], \zeta_k=\frac{k^2}{2m}-\mu,

F\left(\Delta_{0}^*, \Delta^{}{0}\right)=\int \mathscr{D} \bar{C} \mathscr{D} C \mathrm{e}^{-\sum\limits_k \bar{\phi}(k) M{kk} \phi(k)}=\prod_k \operatorname{Det}\left[M_{k k}\right],




$$
接下来考虑鞍点近似 (Saddle-point approximation), 又叫最速下降法, 即令
$$
\frac{\partial S_{\operatorname{eff}}\left(\Delta_0^*, \Delta^{}0\right) }{\partial\Delta_0^* }=0,

\frac{\Delta_0}{g} \beta V-\frac{\sum\limits_k \frac{\partial}{\partial \Delta_0^*} \operatorname{Det}\left[M{k k}\right]}{\operatorname{Det}\left[M_{k k}\right]}=0,



\frac{\Delta_0}{g} \beta V=\sum_k\sum_{\omega_n}\frac{ -\Delta_0}{\left(\mathrm{i} \omega_{n}- \zeta_k\right)\left(\mathrm{i} \omega_{n}+\zeta_k\right)-|\Delta_0|^{2} },



E_k \equiv \sqrt{\zeta_k^2+|\Delta_0|^{2}},

1=-\frac{g}{V}\sum_k\frac{1}{\beta} \sum_{\omega_{n}} \frac{1}{\left(\mathrm i \omega_{n}+E_k\right)\left(\mathrm i \omega_{n}-E_k\right)}.

\begin{aligned} 1&=-\frac{g}{V}\sum_k\left[\left.\operatorname{Res} \frac{n_{\mathrm{F}}(z)}{\left(z+E_k\right)\left(z-E_k\right)}\right|{z=E_k}+\left.\operatorname{Res} \frac{n{\mathrm{F}}(z)}{\left(z+E_k\right)\left(z-E_k\right)}\right|{z=-E_k}\right] \ &=-\frac{g}{V}\sum_k\left[\frac{n{\mathrm{F}}\left(E_k\right)}{2 E_k}+\frac{n_{\mathrm{F}}\left(-E_k\right)}{-2 E_k}\right] \ &=-\frac{g}{V}\sum_k\frac{1}{2 E_k}\left[n_{\mathrm{F}}\left(E_k\right)-\left(n_{\mathrm{F}}\left(-E_k\right)\right)\right] \ &=-\frac{g}{V}\sum_k\frac{1}{2 E_k}\left[\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{\beta E_k}+1}-\frac{1}{\mathrm{e}^{-\beta E_k}+1}\right] \ &=\frac{g}{V}\sum_k\frac{\tanh \frac{\beta E_k}{2}}{2 E_k}, \end{aligned}

\frac{1}{V}\sum_k \to N(0)\int_{-\omega_{\mathrm{D}}}^{\omega_{\mathrm{D}}}\mathrm{d} \zeta_k=2N(0)\int_{0}^{\omega_{\mathrm{D}}}\mathrm{d} \zeta_k

1=gN(0)\int_0^{\omega_{\mathrm{D}}} \mathrm{d} \zeta_k \frac{\tanh \frac{\beta E_k}{2}}{ E_k},
$$
此即BCS能隙方程, 与第四章结果相同.

最后, 如果继续考虑鞍点附近的函数, 可以得到更多有趣的东西.
